text: Þis syndon þa landgemæru to badrices ege & to wendles wurðe.
Þæt is ærest heah yfre, of heah yfre into ceokan ege.
Of ceokan ege into gryddeles elrene, of gryddeles elrene into ðara smalan ac.
Of þara smalan ac into rysmere, of rysmere into leoddebeorge.
Of leoddebyrge into uckebyrge, of uccebyrge into bernneardes byriels.
Of byrnærdes byrielse inne þane blacan mor, of þan blacan more oð middan hlida burnan.
Of hlida burnan in gibbe felde, of gibbe felde in þa blaca dic.
Andlang blaca dic into beferiþi, of beferiðe andlang stræte into fugel riþie.
Andlang fugel riðie into þære tæmese oþ midne streame, andlang streames eft into heah efre.
